nodes.text: Dono was a Human female from Onderon who served the Onderon rebels during the Clone Wars.

When the King of Onderon, Sanjay Rash, allied the planet with the Confederacy of Independent Systems, Dono joined the Onderon rebels. She was present with Hutch and Saw Gerrera when Steela Gerrera arrived with Anakin Skywalker, Rex, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Ahsoka Tano, whose goal was to train the rebels to fight off the droids. While Rex was training the group to disable an AAT, Saw was pushing her on to hurry. Dono later fought in the Battle of Onderon.

After Saw Gerrera devised his own plan in rescuing King Dendup alone, Dono was ordered by Steela to follow him. The plan failed when the Separatists captured him, forcing Dono to return to the rebels and inform the terrible news. However, Steela refused to rescue him and decided to wait until tomorrow since she already devised her plan. When the Onderon rebels tried to save the real King of Onderon from his execution, Dono was killed by a blaster shot from a B2 super battle droid that hit her in the chest.
Dono is voiced by Nika Futterman, who also voices Asajj Ventress in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. The character was named after Kris Donovan, a Lucasfilm Animation staffer.
Dono's hair model was the same used for Boba Fett.
